name: Easy Crossword - Anagram - Pack 1!
description:
If you love to play simple crosswords and word puzzles on anagrams, you will like this easy anagram crossword game.

**********************************
It is as simple as a piece of cake. - Why?!. Because you have Anagram clues for each word
**********************************
Playing crosswords with a wonderful twist of having Anagram clues for each word makes this game easy and interesting to play. So this game is for everyone.

These simple, quick and easy anagram crossword puzzles gives your brain a great workout.

Take time to play, it is the secret of staying young.
